product_name: Patagonia Baby Capilene 3 Midweight Set - Infant/Toddlers'
long_description: Ideal for extra warmth on blustery days, the quick-drying Patagonia Baby Capilene 3 Midweight set keeps babies and toddlers comfortable. Moisture-wicking Capilene(R) performance polyester is quick drying and easy to care for. Features Gladiodor(TM) natural odor control. "Grow-fit" adjustable side snaps on bodysuit allow for 1.5 in. growing room. Baby Capilene 3 Midweight set has a 3-snap closure at crotch that permits easy diaper changes; back gusset accommodates large diaper sizes. Flat seams enhance mobility and help prevent chafing. Pull-on pants feature a covered, elasticized waistband.
